answers.answer: You need to call your doctor. That's a pretty hefty drop. And if nothing else ALWAYS better safe than sorry
I was just diagnosed with preclamsia 3 days ago :(
I'm always in low side my bp always 90/60 it's diff with all of us...90/70 is normal. But if u feel it's too low u need to contact your doc.what is your normal bp?
My normal bp is usually between 120/70 to 110/70 give or take 2-3 on both tops and botoms

I had pre eclamsia with my first pregnancy 13 years ago.  My bk got extremely high and I was super swollen as well.  At 38 weeks I ended up delivering my son by them inducing me because of the high bp.  I then spent the next 2 weeks in the hospital and was put on magnesium sulfate so I WOULDN'T have seizures.  It isn't something to take lightly.  The only symptom I didn't have was protein in my urine.  Lay on your left side and elevate your feet if they are swollen.Take it easy...not worth risking your life or your unborn baby's life. Good luck!!

question: Went to my maternal fetal medicine doctor today for my every 3 week ultrasound and my blood pressure was 150/100! My blood pressure has always been 120/80 average! I have had a slight headache and fatigue the last couple days.  He tells me to go buy a blood pressure machine keep checking and if it gers to 160 call! And gives me a paper about preeclampsia! I leave and feel light headed-like and go buy a digital blood pressure machine check it 2 hours later and it was 107/72. Check it again a few mins ago and its 96/70. And have a headache! I feel so blah!!! Im so confused?? Is that too low now? I dont know what to do?
title: blood pressure 150/100
